testcase.name: API GET /api/v1/users/:user_id/counters lists user's counter
Factory Girl palette factory is valid
Factory Girl counter factory is valid
Factory Girl counter factory with trait a_month_older is valid
Factory Girl counter factory with trait with_user is valid
Factory Girl user factory is valid
Factory Girl user factory with trait with_counter_a_month_old is valid
Factory Girl user factory with trait with_counters is valid
User should have many counters dependent => destroy
User #build_counter
User.find_for_google_oauth2 should return user if exists
User.find_for_google_oauth2 should create a new user if does not exist
Factory Girl user factory is valid
Factory Girl user factory with trait with_counter_a_month_old is valid
Factory Girl user factory with trait with_counters is valid
Factory Girl palette factory is valid
Factory Girl counter factory is valid
Factory Girl counter factory with trait with_user is valid
Factory Girl counter factory with trait a_month_older is valid
counter:colorize changes counter palettes
counter:colorize prerequisites should include "environment"
Palette should have many counters
CounterPolicy update? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy update? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy index? does not grants access if no current_user
CounterPolicy index? grants access if current_user
CounterPolicy new? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy new? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy update? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy update? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy show? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy show? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy destroy? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy destroy? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy edit? grants access if user is current_user
CounterPolicy edit? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy create? does not grants access if user is not current_user
CounterPolicy create? grants access if user is current_user
Counter should require palette to be set
Counter should belong to user
Counter should require name to be set
Counter should belong to palette
Counter# increment
Counter# set_creation_date
Counter# editable_attributes
Counter# increment_url
Counter# clean_value should return 0 if value nil
Counter# clean_value should return value if value
